title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 863.2 - Designated waters
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 863.2 - Designated waters

State Regulations

The designated waters are located within drainage basins
of streams entering the Hudson River in Albany, Columbia, Greene, and

Rensselaer Counties, as outlined on map 1, section
863.7, infra, and as contained
within the topographic limit line shown on reproduced topographical maps in
section
863.9, infra, excluding the waters
contained within boundaries of State-owned forest preserve
lands. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
ยง
863.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
